original_title: As The Dust Settles: A Participatory Documentary Shot at Burning Man
overview: Deep in the Nevada desert, thousands of people meet every summer at a incredible celebration called Burning Man. Here's an intimate glimpse into what 5 participants - known as Burners - discover about love, creativity, the environment, art...and reality.
title: As The Dust Settles: A Participatory Documentary Shot at Burning Man
